Text:
Genre: Action | Drama | Thriller  

Year: 2011

Country: USA

Runtime: 93 min

Director: Simon West

Cast: Jason Statham, Ben Foster, Tony Goldwyn, Donald Sutherland, Jeff Chase, Mini Anden.  



.: Plot :.

Follows an elite hit man as he teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.
The audio on this sounds terribly compressed.  Video is fine, but at nearly 1.5 gigs the audio leaves a lot to be desired.  Not a complaint, just an observation.
